DOC.brief_summary: A national, multicenter, randomized, transverse clinical trial, estimating the existence of phonological deficits in children with NF1 children compared with control children without NF1 with the same reading level.
DOC.brief_title: Reading Disability in Children With NF1
DOC.detailed_description: To determine the phonological and visio -spatial performances at the NF1 children.
